text: Sravu is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Anil Medayil, starring Shankar and Babu Antony in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/sravu- malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Reshma (actress) as Kasthuri * Baiju as Kannan * Captain Raju as Comm.Mohan Roy * Shankar as Hassan Marakkar * Subair as D.G.P * Abu Salim as Chacko * Babu Antony as Bawa * Devan as Captain Napolen/Capt.Patric Perera * Jagannadha Varma as Party President * Jagannathan as P.C Kochayyappan * KTS Padannayil as Azhakathu Swami * Kochu Preman as Military Officer * Risabava as SI Sudheeran Pilla * Sadiq as A.C.P Cholaparamban * Shivaji as I.G. * Baburaj as Paramashivam * Ragasudha as Devu * Karyavattam Sasikumar as Home Minister * Vimal Raj as Deva Narayana Moorthy * Balaji as PC Krishna Kumar * Manu Varma as SI Dinesh * Ramesh as PC Mathews * PAM Rasheed as Military officer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Sravu
